name: The Big Valley Quiz / Test | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Audra (Linda Evans) becomes ill on a train trip. What is her problem?
questions.explanation:
Appendicitis.

	Richard Anderson plays a doctor in distress who happens to be on the train.

questions.text: Victoria (Barbara Stanwyck) is kidnapped due to a case of mistaken identity. Who did her kidnapper think she was?
questions.explanation:
Schoolteacher.

	The kidnapper, Harold J. Stone, wants to learn how to read. He kidnaps her so that he can be a class of one.

questions.text: Heath (Lee Majors) has a romance with which of these women?
questions.explanation:
Katharine Ross.

	Heath has a doomed romance with Ross. Nick gets involved with Diane Baker in a different episode. Jarrod gets involved with St. John and London in two other episodes.

questions.text: Jarrod (Richard Long) encounters an old friend from school. Who is it?
questions.explanation:
William Shatner.

	Shatner plays an old friend who suddenly turns up. Grodin and Johnson played bad guys in a different episode with Majors and Breck. Akins  appeared in a different episode with Breck.

questions.text: Nick (Peter Breck) convinces the town that a seamstress is a notorious woman. who plays the seamstress?
questions.explanation:
Julie Harris.

	Veteran actress Julie Harris plays the meek, mild seamstress. Leachman and Lynley appeared in epsiodes with Majors; Grant appeared in an episode with Breck.

Stockton.

	The Barkleys are said to be the powerhouse family of the region (just as the Cartwrights are in Virginia City in "Bonanza").

questions.text: The storyline (prior to the first episode) says that patriarch Tom Barkley died in battle. Against whom was he fighting?
questions.explanation:
Railroad.

	Old Tom fought against the tyrannical railroad and died in the struggle.

questions.text: Which of these stars appeared on the show?
questions.explanation:
Charles Bronson.

	Bronson appeared in a an episode with Stanwyck. Landon did not appear (although fromer "Bonanza" co-star Pernell Roberts appeared in two different episodes with Breck).

Strawberry.

	Heath was illegitimate; he grew up in a poor mining town before coming to claim his fortune with the Barkley family.

questions.text: Which of the Barkleys gets married during the run of the show?
questions.explanation:
Jarrod.

	Jarrod gets married, then seeks revenge when his wife gets killed.
